message: Hello all we are looking for some really, really, really cool startup's  ( did I say really cool?)  who need a little help, maybe once a week for the projects they are working on! if this is you check us out http://www.tinyangel.me    any feedback would be great also! thank you for reading.
The page isn't rendered right on my netbook (1024x600 resolution).  The top 25% is above the screen and I can't scroll up to see it.
jca - thanks for letting me know! I'll see what the deal is!
Sounds interesting but I'd like to learn more about how it works, before registering. Perhaps a "learn more" page?
agreed, a walk-through video of how you think this will work for everyone (screencast) will probably do better for you than an FAQ
I think a page showing what angels have received cool things so far (trade work, shirts / other merch, etc) from which companies seeking microfunding would be awesome.
